Translations.Text: Nihsandeha amara eti abatarana karechi mahimanbita rajanite.
Ara ki tomake bujhate debe mahimanbita rajaniti ki
mahimanbita rajani hacche hajara masera ca'ite'o srestha.
Phiris‌tagana o ruh tate abatirna haya tadera prabhura anumatikrame pratiti byapara sanbandhe
santi -- phajarera udaya paryanta ta calate thakabe.
Granthadharidera madhye theke yara abisbasa posana kare ara bahukhodabadira tadera charano yacchila na yataksana na tadera kache eseche suspasta pramana
allah‌ra kacha theke ekajana rasula, tini patha karachena pabitra prsthasamuha
Ara yadera granthakhana de'oya hayechila tara bibhakta haya ni yataksana na tadera kache suspasta pramana esechila.

Ara tadera adesa kara haya ni e bhinna ye tara allah‌ra upasana karabe dharme tamra prati bisud'dhacitta haye, ekanisthabhabe, ara namaya kayema karabe o yakata adaya karabe, -- ara e'iti'i supratisthita dharma.
Nihsandeha granthera anubartidera madhyera yara abisbasa posana kare ara bahukhodabadira -- jahannamera agune, ta te tara abasthana karabe. Tara'i sbayam srstajibadera madhye nikrstatama.
Paksantare yara imana eneche o satkaja karache -- tara'i khoda srstajagatera madhye sresthatama.
